subject: Eclipse debugger only stops in static method breakpoints with JUnit4 runner

I am running Eclipse Java EE IDE for Web Developers. Version: Helios Servic=
e Release 1 Build id: 20100917-0705.

I set breakpoints in static methods i=
n a JUnit4 test, e.g. in setUpBeforeClass(), tearDownAfterClass(), etc. I a=
lso set breakpoints in non-static methods annotated with @Test and when I d=
ebug the test, only the breakpoints in the static methods are hit. None of =
breakpoints in the @Test methods are hit.

I found a couple of posts, one s=
uggested rebuilding Eclipse projects and another suggested using JVM option=
 -XX:+UseParallelGC but neither one worked for me.

Running the debugger wi=
th a JUnit3 test worked fine. Breakpoints set in testXXX() methods are hit.=


Does anybody have any suggestions on how to resolve this problem?

Thanks=
, Leo
